attributes.action: Prevent early termination contract charges on broadband when switching provider
attributes.additional_details:
Broadband is now a necessity, and it's unfair on the consumer to be tied to a lengthy contract should a new provider offer a better rate and download speeds.
The consumer should be able to switch providers without early termination fees or paying the remainder of their contract in full.
attributes.background: Create a law banning early contract termination charges for broadband consumers when switching providers,  using a service similar to the energy switch.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568543

The Government is not responsible for the terms and conditions of contracts for commercial services, including internet.
